answers.q: what is the formula for ammonium sulfate

answers.a: No—ammonium sulfate is not flammable; when strongly heated it decomposes, releasing ammonia and sulfur oxides.

answers.q: what is the formula for ammonium sulfate?
what is ammonium sulfate used for
answers.a: Primarily as a fertilizer; as a food additive (E517) it’s used in small amounts as a dough conditioner and yeast nutrient in baking, and sometimes to help regulate acidity.
